about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Which of these statements is true about large trucks?

about.name: Which of these statements is true about large trucks?

hasPart.assesses: Which of these statements is true about large trucks? | Which of these statements is true about large trucks? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Large trucks take longer to stop than other vehicles traveling at the same speed. The average passenger vehicle traveling at 55 mph can stop within 400 feet. However, a large truck traveling at the same speed can take almost 800 feet to stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: They take longer to stop than passenger vehicles.

comment.text: They take longer to stop than passenger vehicles.

suggestedAnswer.text: They all have air brakes that allow them to stop quickly.

comment.text: They all have air brakes that allow them to stop quickly.

suggestedAnswer.text: They are more maneuverable than passenger vehicles.

comment.text: They are more maneuverable than passenger vehicles.

acceptedAnswer.text: They take longer to stop than passenger vehicles.

comment.text: They take longer to stop than passenger vehicles.

answerExplanation.text: Large trucks take longer to stop than other vehicles traveling at the same speed. The average passenger vehicle traveling at 55 mph can stop within 400 feet. However, a large truck traveling at the same speed can take almost 800 feet to stop.

comment.text: Which of these statements is true about large trucks? | Large trucks take longer to stop than other vehicles traveling at the same speed. The average passenger vehicle traveling at 55 mph can stop within 400 feet. However, a large truck traveling at the same speed can take almost 800 feet to stop.

hasPart.name: There is a vehicle stopped on the right shoulder of the road with its hazard lights on. You should:

about.name: There is a vehicle stopped on the right shoulder of the road with its hazard lights on. You should:

hasPart.assesses: There is a vehicle stopped on the right shoulder of the road with its hazard lights on. You should: | There is a vehicle stopped on the right shoulder of the road with its hazard lights on. You should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you see a vehicle’s hazard lights ahead, slow down. There may be a collision or other road emergency ahead. Stop and give assistance if asked by anyone, or pass very carefully.

suggestedAnswer.text: Change lanes to the left and speed up.

comment.text: Change lanes to the left and speed up.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and pass very carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and pass very carefully.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop your vehicle until you can see what has happened.

comment.text: Stop your vehicle until you can see what has happened.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and pass very carefully.

comment.text: Slow down and pass very carefully.

answerExplanation.text: If you see a vehicle’s hazard lights ahead, slow down. There may be a collision or other road emergency ahead. Stop and give assistance if asked by anyone, or pass very carefully.

hasPart.assesses: When you see this sign, you: | When you see this sign, you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This sign indicates that you are approaching a railroad crossing. You must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Wait for any trains to pass before you proceed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Are approaching a railroad crossing and should prepare to stop.

comment.text: Are approaching a railroad crossing and should prepare to stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: Will always stop at the upcoming railroad crossing.

comment.text: Will always stop at the upcoming railroad crossing.

suggestedAnswer.text: Should stop and wait for a signal before crossing the railroad tracks.

comment.text: Should stop and wait for a signal before crossing the railroad tracks.

acceptedAnswer.text: Are approaching a railroad crossing and should prepare to stop.

comment.text: Are approaching a railroad crossing and should prepare to stop.

answerExplanation.text: This sign indicates that you are approaching a railroad crossing. You must look, listen, slow down, and prepare to stop. Wait for any trains to pass before you proceed.

hasPart.name: To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver:

about.name: To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver:

hasPart.assesses: To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver: | To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver, concentrate on driving and don't take the actions of other drivers personally. Be realistic about your travel time, drive within posted speed limits, and be forgiving of other drivers using the roadway.

comment.text: Relax and concentrate on driving.

suggestedAnswer.text: Drive above the posted speed limit.

comment.text: Drive above the posted speed limit.

suggestedAnswer.text: Tailgate the driver in front of you.

comment.text: Tailgate the driver in front of you.
Relax and concentrate on driving.

answerExplanation.text: To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver, concentrate on driving and don't take the actions of other drivers personally. Be realistic about your travel time, drive within posted speed limits, and be forgiving of other drivers using the roadway.

comment.text: To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver: | To prevent yourself from becoming an aggressive driver, concentrate on driving and don't take the actions of other drivers personally. hasPart.name: Which of the following is true about vehicles displaying a diamond-shaped sign that indicates a hazardous load?

about.name: Which of the following is true about vehicles displaying a diamond-shaped sign that indicates a hazardous load?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following is true about vehicles displaying a diamond-shaped sign that indicates a hazardous load? | Which of the following is true about vehicles displaying a diamond-shaped sign that indicates a hazardous load? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Vehicles displaying hazardous load signs are required to stop before crossing railroad tracks.

suggestedAnswer.text: They are not allowed to drive on freeways.

comment.text: They are not allowed to drive on freeways.

suggestedAnswer.text: They must stop before crossing railroad tracks.

comment.text: They must stop before crossing railroad tracks.

suggestedAnswer.text: They are not allowed to exceed 35 mph.

comment.text: They are not allowed to exceed 35 mph.

acceptedAnswer.text: They must stop before crossing railroad tracks.

comment.text: They must stop before crossing railroad tracks.

answerExplanation.text: Vehicles displaying hazardous load signs are required to stop before crossing railroad tracks.

comment.text: Which of the following is true about vehicles displaying a diamond-shaped sign that indicates a hazardous load? | Vehicles displaying hazardous load signs are required to stop before crossing railroad tracks.
